snippet: Prosecutors say the two men in the photos used Joshua Rubin's credit cards at the Woodbury Common outlet center hours after Mr. Rubin's body was found along a roadside.
abstract: Prosecutors say the two men in the photos used Joshua Rubin's credit cards at the Woodbury Common outlet center hours after Mr. Rubin's body was found along a roadside.

headline.main: Photos Released in Case of Murdered Brooklyn Cafe Owner
headline.print_headline: 2 in Video Tied to Slain Cafe Owner
